name: BluePay
description: QR-based Web3 micropayment gateway designed for on-demand access. Build on x402 protocol. Live on Virtuals Protocol. Building the core infrastructure for x402 protocol payments running on Base Chain which is the golden blockchain for micropayments due to low cost and high speed transactions. x402 has the potential to be the new NEOBANK on-chain with huge upside potential to get the share of the trad-fi volume.
